# isEmpty

**Instance Property**

Returns whether the text range is empty.

## Declaration

```swift
var isEmpty: Bool { get }
```

## Characteristics of the text range

- **location**: The starting location of the text range.
- **endLocation**: The ending location of the text range.

items.description: The starting location of the text range.
items.name: location

items.description: The ending location of the text range.
items.name: endLocation
